law.catch_line: Tentative preapproval of plans for special education programs.
law.text: The local superintendent of schools shall present to the chief state school officer an application for tentative preapproval of a plan for special education programs for exceptional children.
law.history: Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 476, Part IV, sec. 185, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 169, sec. 9. -- Created 1948 Ky. Acts ch. 4, sec. 10.
